name: Hillclimb Challangers
description:
This is my first project made in Unity. 

It's a simple low poly time attack racing game. Feel free to comment bellow.

Contents

  • 7 differently setup cars
  • 3 basic and 13 unlockable car colors
  • 5 tracks
  • soundtrack (more information and links in credits)
  • local HotSeat multiplayer (similar to TrackMania)
  • approximately 45 minutes of playtime to unlock all colors

Controlls:

↑Forward↓Brake/Reverse→Right←LeftEscMenuCChange cameraRQuick resetTChange radio
